about_the_game:
Fruity Friendz Adventurez is a cool FREE TO PLAY casual game with action, adventure, educational features and humor. It's all taking place in a beautiful environment including forest, rivers, lakes, mountains.

The story is about Peter Pear, paint artist and creator father of the Fruity Friend Benny Banana, is kidnapped by the Villainz and taken hostage into the Villainz castle. 

Benny will have to explore the big world and face many challenges like trap holes , pendulums and mazes. In the entire world annoying Crumbleez (cookie crumble creatures)  appear from everywhere and challenge Benny to battle them, that will decrease his energy life bar, but can be filled up by collecting fruit. 

On his quest to find Peter and free him, he has to defeat the end boss Keki. But only with enough collected coins and defeated Crumbleez.
